title: Advancing flexible thermoelectrics for integrated electronics
content:
Chem. Soc. Rev., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4CS00361F, Review Article
Xiao-Lei Shi, Lijun Wang, Wanyu Lyu, Tianyi Cao, Wenyi Chen, Boxuan Hu, Zhi-Gang Chen
This review offers a comprehensive examination of the advancements, challenges, and future prospects in multifunctional integrated energy conversion and storage technologies, focusing on flexible thermoelectrics.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
